sentence.Network_en: He had been unwittingly deluded by their mystical nonsense.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不知不觉被他们故弄玄虚的胡说八道给骗了。

sentence.Network_en: He was unwittingly caught up in the confrontation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他无意间卷入了这场冲突之中。

sentence.Network_en: She had broken the law unwittingly, but still she had broken it.
sentence.Network_cn: 她并非故意犯法，但毕竟是犯了法。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国大学翻译中文38_书面语语_DuSystem... ... 无意识 unconsciously 无意识地 unwittingly 无感动 acathexis.
Sing Most beautiful/最美,Yu Quan/羽泉 ... 你的 your;yours 不知不觉 unconsciously;unwittingly 每一个 every;each.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unwitting 不知情的 unwittingly 不知情地 unwomanly 不似女流的.
GRE词汇... ... unwelcome 不受欢迎的,不被喜欢的 unwittingly 不自觉地,非故意地,不经心地 uphold 支撑,赞成,坚持,举起,鼓励.

list.abs: He unwittingly entered the ladies ' toilet ., 他不经意地进入女厕所.
ago we had unwittingly entered a social network era !, 曾几何时我们是社会已经不知不觉进入了网络时代!
People hate those who unwittingly harm the cause of peace ., 人们痛恨那些在不知不觉中危害和平事业的人.
The researchers have unwittingly opened a door letting all Hell break loose ., 研究人员曾无意之中打开了一扇门 , 将地狱里的一切都释放了出来.

entry.tran: 不知情的；不知不觉的；无意的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their actions as unwitting, you mean that the person does something or is involved in something without realizing it.

example.ex: We're unwitting victims of the system...
example.tran: 我们都是该系统的不知情的受害者。

example.ex: It had been an unwitting blunder on Blair's part.
example.tran: 它曾是布莱尔的无心之失。

auth_sentence.content: If unwittingly this kind of sharing as invi dious.
auth_sentence.res_content: If unwittingly this kind of sharing as invi dious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If unwittingly this kind of sharing as invi dious.

auth_sentence.content: BTW, she unwittingly strengthened my marriage!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BTW, she unwittingly strengthened my marriage!

means.word_mean: 无意地;不经意地;不知不觉地

sentences.en: My remarks about divorce had unwittingly touched a raw nerve.
sentences.cn: 我关于离婚的言论无意间触到了别人的痛处。

sentences.en: People hate those who unwittingly harm the cause of peace.
sentences.cn: 人们痛恨那些在不知不觉中危害和平事业的人。

sentences.en: Walkers can unwittingly damage the fragile environment in which the birds live.
sentences.cn: 徒步旅行者可能无意中破坏鸟类生活的脆弱环境。
